project_abstract.cdata: The Cotton Subsector Development Project will provide financial assistance to support three broad sets of activities; (i) reconstructing the cotton industry through (a) revision of the legal framework, liquidation of Government regulatory and marketing agency and establishment of an industry based regulatory body, and support of operations of the regulatory body; (b) transformation of Cooperative Union owned ginneries into creditworthy operators, including strengthening management and technical training to the industry; and (c) support of Government oversight of the subsector reform; (ii) improve supporting services through support for national research and extension programs; (iii) improved delivery mechanisms and availability of credit and seeds through provision of short and medium term credit and distribution of quality seed to farmers.
